13 Inch Floor model drill press with dual laser guide system

  • motor 13 Inch floor drill press with dual intersecting adjustable laser guides Halogen light incorporated into head (halogen light bulb included) Accepts up to 5/8” shanked drill bits Heavy-duty cast-iron table and base 16 speed (220-3,600 spindle RPM) Spindle is supported by high quality ball bearings 45° tilting table for angular drilling Positive depth stop for quick and easy adjustment Comes with 5/8” drill chuck, chuck key and chuck key holder

entry.title: Dynabrade 40326 - Pneumatic Belt Sander Includes Arm 11287 For 5/8 Ox 3/4-20-1/2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Belt Sanders
Price: 859.49

[shortdesc]
  • Dynafile II Abrasive Belt Tool
  • .5 hp, 7 Degree Offset, 20,000 RPM, Front Exhaust, 1/4 Inch-3/4 Inch W x 20-1/2 Inch L (6-19 mm x 521 mm) Belts
  • Grind, deburr, blend and polish, on metal, plastic, fiberglass, composites, rubber, glass and more
  • Grind from contact wheel or platen pad
  • finish and polish using slack of belt.
  • Lightweight, ergonomic 7 degree offset design
  • Grinding head pivots 360 degrees for securing in most efficient position.
  • Belt guard easily detaches for quick abrasive change
  • simple belt tracking adjustment knob.
  • Kit includes 11287 Contact Arm for 5/8 Inch or 3/4 Inch wide abrasive belts
  • (11287 is only arm that accepts 20-1/2 Inch long belts.)
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Exhaust Type Front
    Height 4-7/8 Inch
    Hose ID 3/8 Inch
    HP 0.5
    Product Type Belt Sanders
    RPM 20000

entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Belt Sanders
Price: 950.17

[shortdesc]
  • Mini-Dynafile II Abrasive Belt Tool Versatility Kit
  • .4 hp, 7 Degree Offset, 25,000 RPM, Rear Exhaust, for 1/8 Inch-1/2 Inch W x 12 Inch L (3-13 mm x 305 mm) Belts
  • Ideal for strap polishing and working in narrow openings
  • Kit includes 15003 Tool (15118 Drive Wheel) with 15026 Contact Arm for 1/2 Inch wide x 12 Inch long abrasive belts

  • Belt guard easily detaches for quick abrasive change

entry.title: Dynabrade Dynabelter 11477 - Pneumatic Belt Sander Ex Heavy Duty 2Hp Ver 1.2-30 Be
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Belt Sanders
Price: 3154.08

[shortdesc]
  • Dynabelter Abrasive Belt Tool, Extra Heavy-Duty
  • 2 hp, Vertical, 7,200 RPM, Front Exhaust, for 1 Inch-2 Inch W x 30 Inch L (25-51 mm x 762 mm) Belts
  • For weld grinding, blending and finishing, on metal and other surfaces
  • Dynabelter is ideal for work on ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic, stone and composites.
  • Uses include grinding cylinders, deburring castings, cleaning welds and fabricating metals
  • Also excellent for polishing tubing, deburring structural steel, finish-dimensioning on lathe work and blending inside corners
  • Safety-lock lever throttle included.
  • Extra Heavy-Duty, 2.0 hp model accepts 2 Inch wide x 30 Inch long abrasive belts
  • Includes pressure bar with top control handle
  • Includes 11870 Contact Arm Assembly.
  • 11871 Contact Arm with 4 Inch dia
  • contact wheel is available for 2 Inch wide x 60 Inch long belts, providing a 20 Inch workable reach
  • Optional 11891 Platen is available for 11871 Arm.
  • Ideal for use with 1/2 Inch Dynaswivel, and 98273 Coupler/Plug Assembly.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Line Dynabelter
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Belt Sanders
    RPM 7200

entry.title: Dynabrade 67912 - 2 X 60 L Three Wheel Belt Grinder 1.5 Hp 115 V 1 Phase 60 Frequency 800-8000 Sfpm (244-2438 Sm/Min)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Grinders
Price: 5954.85

[shortdesc]
  • 2 Inch (51 mm) W x 60 Inch (1,524 mm) L Three Wheel Belt Grinder
  • 1.5 hp, 115 V, 1 Phase, 60 Frequency, 800-8,000 SFPM (244-2,438 SM/Min)
  • This Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is a versatile three-wheel belt grinding machine
  • It powers abrasive belts that are 2 Inch wide by 60 Inch long (51 mm x 1,524 mm).
  • Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is ideal for a variety of applications, including grinding, deburring, finishing, shaping, fitting, plus removing flash and parting lines
  • Machine design allows smooth grinding from contact wheel, and sanding or finishing from slack of belt
  • Offered in complete range of electrical configurations.
  • Amazing versatility ? grind from contact wheel or platen
  • finish from slack of belt
  • Fully guarded to meet all OSHA standards
  • Work rest is adjustable to ensure accurate angle grinding.
  • Quick and easy belt change minimizes downtime and increases efficiency
  • Can be bench-mounted or attached to optional 67500 Pedestal Stand, as shown
  • Pedestal Stand offers height adjustment of 28 Inch (711mm) to 38 Inch (965), with capacity up to 300 lbs
  • (136 kg)
  • Optional 67965 Vacuum Scoop also available, for efficient capture of dust and debris.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Air Flow 64.0
    Height 5-1/4 Inch
    HP 2
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Grinders

  • 2 Inch (51 mm) W x 60 Inch (1,524 mm) L Three Wheel Belt Grinder
  • 1.5 hp, 230 V, 1 Phase, 60 Frequency, 8,000 SFPM (2,438 SM/Min)
  • This Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is a versatile three-wheel belt grinding machine
  • It powers abrasive belts that are 2 Inch wide by 60 Inch long (51 mm x 1,524 mm).
  • Dynabrade Bench & Pedestal Belt Grinder is ideal for a variety of applications, including grinding, deburring, finishing, shaping, fitting, plus removing flash and parting lines
  • Machine design allows smooth grinding from contact wheel, and sanding or finishing from slack of belt
  • Offered in complete range of electrical configurations.
  • Amazing versatility ? grind from contact wheel or platen
  • finish from slack of belt
  • Fully guarded to meet all OSHA standards
  • Work rest is adjustable to ensure accurate angle grinding.
  • Quick and easy belt change minimizes downtime and increases efficiency
  • Can be bench-mounted or attached to optional 67500 Pedestal Stand, as shown
  • Pedestal Stand offers height adjustment of 28 Inch (711mm) to 38 Inch (965), with capacity up to 300 lbs
  • (136 kg)
  • Optional 67965 Vacuum Scoop also available, for efficient capture of dust and debris.

[shortdesc]
  • Pneumatic Pipe Belt Finisher
  • .7 hp (522 W) 3,400 RPM, Rear Exhaust, 1/2 Inch to 1-1/2 Inch x 30 Inch (13 mm to 38 mm x 762 mm) Belts
  • Air-powered Pipe Belt Finisher achieves top-quality finishes on rounded surfaces in record time! Sand, blend, surface condition, polish and finish on metals such as stainless steel and aluminum
  • An essential tool for metal and railing fabrication, plus pharmaceutical equipment, food industries and more!
  • Accepts abrasive belts in widths of 1/2 Inch to 1-1/2 Inch, by 30 Inch in length (13 mm to 38 mm x 762 mm)
  • For use on rounded surfaces from 3/8 Inch to 6 Inch in diameter (10 mm - 152 mm).
  • Safety-lock throttle lever prevents accidental start-up of tool
  • Side-handle adjusts for optimum comfort and control
  • Comfortable grip may be moved for left or right hand use.
  • Extended rear exhaust muffler ensures the lowest sound levels
  • Ergonomic tool grip is insulated for extended use
  • Adjustable head-assembly is easily rotated to suit each application
  • Tension-arm allows quick and easy changing of abrasive belts.
  • Abrasive belt contacts 180 degrees of workpiece circumference, for diameters from 3/8 Inch to 2-3/8 Inch (10 mm to 60 mm)
  • May also be used on rounded surfaces a large as 6 Inch (152 mm) in diameter.
